Please consider introducing mindfulness training into primary and secondary schools!

Mindfulness is increasingly recognised as a way to live healthier, more self-aware and balanced lives.

Over time, this will lead to greater happiness within ourselves and others.

While it's vital our children are equipped with knowledge of maths, science and language - why wouldn't we want to teach our children the skills to be happy and balanced within ourselves and others?

Surely this is our ultimate aim.
